author: Staff Reporter
text:
With the announcement of elections, a 24-hour flying squad has been formed in the district. Similarly, election monitoring committees would be under operation in each of the Assembly constituencies.

Public complaints concerning the conduct of campaign, and other complaints regarding elections may be made to elections2016.dpi @gmail.com; alternatively, complaints may also be made to the toll free number 1800 425 7071, or SMS to 8903891077.

Also, persons in possession of rifles, pistols are directed to hand over their weapons to the concerned police stations, until such time the model code of conduct is lifted.

Also, with the coming into force of the Model Code of Conduct, all public grievance meetings will be suspended. Until such time, public is requested to put in their petitions at the grievances box at the Collectorate and the same shall be forwarded to the concerned department officials for taking action and redressal, Collector and District Election Officer K. Vivekanandan said.
title: Flying squad formed in Dharmapuri district
